concept.title: Profiles
concept.abstract: Profiles provide a means of customizing the effective project map.

conbody.p: A profile is a named map. Leiningen predefines several system profiles: :base, :system, :user, :dev, and :provided. The system profiles are always in effect; user-defined can override and/or extend them. User-defined profiles can be specified in several places:
At runtime, Leiningen integrates profiles with the project configuration map of project.clj to produce the effective project map.
